title: 2025年9月及之后的国内新冠疫情中期展望-后大流行时期的生活429
title_zh: 2025年9月及之后的国内新冠疫情中期展望
summary_en: The article analyzes China's mid-term COVID-19 epidemic outlook after the pandemic period, highlighting variant dominance, regional peaks, and monthly trends. From March to August 2025, different regions reached their peaks at varying times (Northeast in March, Beijing/Tianjin in May, Shanghai in late May, Chongqing in June, Guangdong in May, etc.). From August to November 2025, NB.1.8.1 and PQ.2 remain dominant, while XFG grows abroad but has limited domestic impact. Rainfall and seasonal factors contributed to regional fluctuations, slowing the nationwide decline.
summary_zh: 本文对2025年9月及之后国内新冠疫情中期走势进行展望。重点包括：变异株NB.1.8.1及PQ.2在6~8月持续占主导；东北地区在3月达峰，北京、天津及华北在5月上旬达峰，上海及长三角在5月底达峰，重庆在6月上旬达峰，广东和香港在5月下旬达峰。7月、8月因南方梅雨和台风、北方降水等因素导致疫情回落速度放缓并出现波动。预计8月~11月NB.1.8.1及PQ.2仍是主要流行株，但PQ.2可能逐渐上升。
best_quote_en: From a nationwide perspective, the current wave is still ongoing but nearing its end; regional peaks occurred at different months—March in Northeast, May in Beijing and Tianjin, late May in Shanghai, June in Chongqing, and May in Guangdong.
best_quote_zh: 从全国视角看，目前这一轮新冠疫情仍处于流行期，但已接近尾声；区域达峰时间差异明显——东北在3月，北京和天津在5月上旬，上海在5月底，重庆在6月，广东在5月下旬。
